Mata Vaishnodevi is considered as a manifestation of goddess and it is attributed as Shakti. You have got access to this wonderful shrine at an altitude of 5200 meters and have now to travel a distance of around 14km to reach at the very top o f the shrine. The individuals call the goddess as Mata Rani and it is said that the in-patient gets the boons if he has really has got the faith and dedication to the goddess.It is also referred to as confluence of principal deities and these include Maha Lakshmi, Maha kali and Maha Saraswati.The winter can be cruel and it may result in a problem for you personally. The optimum time to see this excellent shrine is through the hot season and it is really an excellent experience; however the devotee who has got great faith will not care about the temperature and then he visits the shrine in any season. T there is the specific means of doing the pilgrimage and after travelling a distance of 14 km up the hill, you're feeling on top around the globe and feel as your you've got achieved a grace which you were in reality missing that you experienced.
